    • Uses of Abortable in org.apache.distributedlog

      Subinterfaces of Abortable in org.apache.distributedlog 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  LogWriter
      A generic interface class to support writing log records into a persistent distributed log.

    • Uses of Abortable in org.apache.distributedlog.io

      Methods in org.apache.distributedlog.io with parameters of type Abortable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Abortables.abort(Abortable abortable, boolean swallowIOException)
      Aborts a Abortable, with control over whether an IOException may be thrown.
      static void Abortables.abortQuietly(Abortable abortable)
      Aborts the given abortable, logging any IOException that's thrown rather than propagating it.
